createAppWithNoCode: Create applications with no code by describing roles and tasks
assistantCanUseSkillsAndTools: The assistant can use multiple skills and tools
simpleNodeOrchestration: Orchestrate task flows through simple nodes, supporting parallel and cyclic processes, and complex human-computer interactions during workflow execution
richComponentsForBuildingApps: Build applications with rich components, providing more parameters for fine-tuning effects.
chooseTemplateOrCreateBlank: You can choose a template to start with or create a blank application.
confirmDeleteTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete the {{type}} template?
templateManagementDescription: Manage application templates. Templates are visible to all users and support drag-and-drop sorting and deletion.
maxNameLengthAssistant: Name can be up to 50 characters
minDescLengthAssistant: For better assistant performance, the description needs to be more than 20 characters
name: Workflow name
build_roleAndTasks: What role do you want the assistant to play, and what specific tasks should it complete?
build_forExample: For example: I need an assistant that can answer technical questions
currentVersionLaunched: The current version has been launched. Please save it as a new version to make changes.
unsavedChangesPrompt: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
confirmImport: Importing will overwrite the existing workflow. Confirm import?
pleaseLinkStartNode: Please link the start node first
unconnectedNodes: There are unconnected nodes. Please check if all connections are complete.
parallelInputOutputNodes: Multiple input or output nodes (dialogue inputs) cannot execute in parallel
parallelOutputNodes: Multiple output nodes (input interactions) cannot execute in parallel
unconnectedConditionNode: [{{nodeName}}] Node error: There are unconnected touchpoints
variableNameInvalid: Variable name can only contain English characters, numbers, and underscores, and cannot start with a number
maxOptionsError: You can add up to 30 options
optionsRequired: At least one option is required
uploadExample: e.g., Upload last yearâ€™s financial report
atLeastOneFormItem: At least one form item must be added
userInputPlaceholder: Leave this blank if users need to input opinions manually; you can pre-fill the text to allow users to modify it and submit.
chooseInteractionTooltip: Provide options for users to choose from, for example, when sensitive operations require user confirmation to proceed.
inputInteractionTooltip: Provide the ability for users to edit text, suitable for multi-step task processing scenarios, such as allowing users to directly modify model-generated content or input suggestions for optimization. Submitted content will be stored in the output_result variable.
onlineVersionMessage: The current version is online and cannot be modified. You can save the changes as a new version.
unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
nodeErrorMessage: {{nodeName}} node error: {{varNameCn}} is invalid, possibly because the related node has been deleted or replaced. Please reassign the variable.
storeFilesSentInCurrentSession: Store files sent in the current session
displayNameTooltip: Displayed on the user conversation page
variableNameTooltipFile: Used to store content entered on the user conversation page; can be selected from the temporary session file list
variableNameTooltipOther: Used to store content entered on the user conversation page; can be referenced in other nodes
